name: Magic maze
tagline: Magic Maze - Ruby/SDL port - Magic Maze is a simple and low-tech monster-bashing maze game. - It was originally inspired by playing Gauntlet II on the Atari ST.
body:
### Magic Maze: Arcane Arena Anarchy

Work is in progress on an HTML5 version of Magic Maze with some new ideas and features... stay curious!


Magic Maze is a simple and low-tech monster-bashing maze game. 

It was originally inspired by playing Gauntlet II on the Atari ST.


Magic Maze 1.4.x:
- http://magicmaze.rubyforge.org/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
